title: Zacs e cant see range
body: If this is intentional please change it back. I cant see the range on my jump anymore and its pissing me off.

replies.body: You probably already have it turned on but sometimes after a patch I have had the range indicators turned off on me, may be worth a shot?
its turned on, it shows me the smallest range not the largest range of its full cast. so i cant hover over the ability to see how long i can jump.
